Data PrivacyğŸ”’
The Autosave extension never stores any of your Hubspot data on our servers. When installing the extension, your browser notifies you that the extension can "read and change your data on all hubspot.com sites", and  "read your browser history".

The reasons are:
- we need to be able to read the Hubspot website to detect the save button and notes ("read data")
- we need to be able to click the save button when it appears ("change data")
- we need to be able to detect if you're on hubspot.com to trigger the save button search ("read browser history")
